sentences.sContent: The old dustman has been working on this street for twenty years.
sentences.sContent_eng: The old dustman has been working on this street for twenty years.
sentences.sCn: 这个老清洁工达条街上干了20年了。

sentences.sContent: He started out as a Dublin dustman and became one of the founding fathers of the resurgence of the Temple Bar district of the capital.
sentences.sContent_eng: He started out as a Dublin dustman and became one of the founding fathers of the resurgence of the Temple Bar district of the capital.
sentences.sCn: 他从都柏林的一个清洁工做起，成为了首都圣殿酒吧区复兴的奠基人之一。

sentences.sContent: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as a dustman.
sentences.sContent_eng: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as a dustman.
sentences.sCn: 然后他换上工装裤，作为清洁工人度过接下去的八小时。

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to remove waste from  dustbin s
